author: janie1church57
text:
You and your guests will enjoy one of the most beautiful banquet halls in Michigan for your event. Not to mention, our professional can help arrange your wedding venue entertainment, florists, photographers, and any needed transportation needed between the ceremony space to the wedding reception. On top of that, our expansive Birmingham, Michigan wedding venue provides tons of related services specifically for wedding receptions in Michigan including stress-free rehearsal dinners and customized post-wedding brunch menu. The Townsend Hotel also provides some of the newest wedding trends such as decadent grooms cakes, specialized menus, and exquisite dĂŠcor.
From beautiful ceremony spaces to amazing rehearsal dinners and memorable brunches on the following day, Townsend creates an experience you wont be able to forget. Positioned in Birmingham, Michigan, one of the more upscale Detroit suburbs in West Bloomfield, we offer everything you need to bring your vision to life all in a convenient location.
Tell Us About Your Wedding
The Townsend Hotel can bring your dream tao liferight from the initial engagement announcement to the pre-wedding preparations, all the way to an enchanted wedding ceremony and wedding reception. Our elegant reception hall gives you a perfect setting, personalized support and accommodations to create an incredible event for you and your guests. 
Wedding Dining Packages
The Townsend Hotel also provides Catering with our exceptional culinary team at your disposal. Personalized attention is given to your menu, and the menu itself will be created to reflect your theme. We customize our dining packages to fit any occasion.
